name: Stoic Life Calendar

Let that determine what you
features: Gain a greater appreciation of life and the time we have left; Understand your mortality and the preciousness of life; Develop a sense of urgency and focus on what matters most; Make better decisions in light of your mortality; Develop a deeper understanding of what truly matters in life; Increase self-awareness by understanding your mortality and mortality of those around you; Setup the calendar to your current age(guide included!); Realize how much of your life you've already lived and then decide to appreciate the rest by living it better.; Check in weekly to check off a box for every new week you're alive  and be reminded of your mortality every time.; Easily adjust size of calendar to your screen size
